product_name: The North Face Light Crew Neck Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Light Crew Neck women's top helps keep muscles warm during mild-weather activities such as hiking, running and walking. It wicks moisture and dries quickly for extended comfort. Moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Flatlock seams; next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Light Crew Neck women's top helps keep muscles warm during mild-weather activities such as hiking, running and walking. It wicks moisture and dries quickly for extended comfort.
